title: Game crashes immediately after starting the game clint
body:
Problem signature:
  Problem Event Name:	APPCRASH
  Application Name:	League of Legends.exe
  Application Version:	8.12.233.6205
  Application Timestamp:	5b184c9b
  Fault Module Name:	StackHash_4e5d
  Fault Module Version:	0.0.0.0
  Fault Module Timestamp:	00000000
  Exception Code:	c0000005
  Exception Offset:	000a039a
  OS Version:	6.1.7601.2.1.0.256.48
  Locale ID:	1033
  Additional Information 1:	4e5d
  Additional Information 2:	4e5d5dc6aabf76cc679d707f73217047
  Additional Information 3:	c3f4
  Additional Information 4:	c3f4f21ff0efa95302412e4fece51da2


What i have tried.

Closing all other programs and running league by itself.

Deleting everything in the 0.0.0.151 and repairing the game. 
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.151

Deleting/reinstalling game

All drivers and device drivers are up to date.

I spent a few hours looking around on search engines and could not find any solutions.
Please help.{{champion:103}}

replies.body: Possibly related to the content posted in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through that thread and posting there if you are still having issues.
